articles.title: Body parts that bear the burden of unwanted emotions - The Times of India
articles.description: ​Stress can accumulate in various parts of the body, such as the shoulders, neck, and back, leading to tension and pain. Addressing stress through relaxation and mindfulness can help alleviate these physical symptoms.
articles.content: The stomach is highly sensitive to emotional states, often reacting to stress, fear, and anxiety. This can manifest as digestive issues, such as nausea, cramps, or irritable bowel syndrome (IBS). Mai… [+89 chars]
